title: I have dodge timer because my league client disconnects when i try to pick champions
body:
All the info in the title
rito fix ur game please.



I just want to play the game

replies.body: If you keep disconnecting during champ select, there may actually be something blocking your network from being able to get a strong enough connection with our servers. Double check some of your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) paying close attention to firewalls, antivirus, as well as port forwarding and how to configure your DNS. Let me know if none of that seems to be helping though!

i've had this issue before and done many of the procedures provided to me.

My network isnt exactly at fault.

This issue happens randomly and it gets rather triggering.

It isnt a network traffic issue either since i know no one is streaming or doing something that requires gigabytes of usages.

but I will see if it is a dns issue
